titlestmt.titleproper: BU Records: Committee on Committees, Inclusive: 1988-1996, Bulk: 1994-1995

note.p: Â© 2021 The Texas Collection. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: Finding Aid was generated by The Texas Collection staff, using the STAR Knowledge Center for Archives (SKCA) task that automatically creates EAD files from the Archive's SKCA catalog records.

did.head: Records Summary
did.abstract: BU Records: Committee on Committees contains correspondence, reports, meeting minutes, and other documents relating to the activities of the Baylor University Committee on Committees.

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: The Baylor University Committee on Committees is charged with nominating eligible faculty and staff to fill vacancies on university-wide committees. The committee reviews committee descriptions and advises the Faculty Senate on adding new committees, revising existing committees, or eliminating current committees. The committee reports to the Provost and Faculty Senate. The committee is comprised of three faculty representatives from the College of Arts and Sciences and one representative from each of the other academic units on campus. The Chair of the Faculty Senate, the Chair of Staff Council, and the President of Baylor Student Government serve as ex-officio members.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection begins in 1988 and ends in 1996. Series I. Administrative contains correspondence, guidelines, reports, and meeting minutes relating to the committee's activity from 1994-1996. Series II. Self-Studies contains materials from the Self Study Subcommittee on the Faculty and Committees (SSS) and Senate Committee on the Committee on Committees (CCC) materials.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Prior to current processing, the collection was arranged in labeled folders in alphabetical order. Currently, the collection is arranged in this original order with the original folder tiles in two series: I. Administrative and II. Self-Studies. Within each folder, materials were kept in original order, which is not necessarily chronological.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: All requests for copying of materials must be submitted to The Texas Collection in writing. Please use the Request Form for Copying Materials sheet. Unpublished materials authored or otherwise produced by the creator (s) of this collection are in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

userestrict.head: Use/Re-use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: BU Records: Committee on Committees, Accession #BU/361, Box #, Folder #, The Texas Collection, Baylor University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Described by Leanna Barcelona. Released on 2020-02-13.

bibref.extref: "University Committee on Committees." University Committees, Baylor University. Accessed 2020 January 28.

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: This series contains general files as well as meeting minutes, correspondence, and reports. This series is in good condition.

bioghist.p: This series includes three folders relating to the Self-Study Subcommittee on the Faculty and Committees (SSS) and Senate Committee on the committee on Committees (CCC). This series is in good condition.
